website_summaries.verdict: A blast from the past, the K-Swiss Ultrascendor sends you back to the 90s with its classic-looking aesthetic. Though it’s somewhat bulky versus the majority of the tennis shoes today, this stability court trainer is arranged with comfy padding from the collar and tongue to the midsole. It’s designed with a supportive upper and sole to keep you balanced while you dart around the court. If you’re up for the retro vibe, this budget-friendly pick might be the perfect match for you.
pros: Multiple buyers claim that the K-Swiss Ultrascendor offers fantastic lateral stability
To a significant sum of reviewers, this all-court trainer delivers excellent cushioning, especially under the heel
This Aosta rubber outsole provides a good amount of court grip, many users mention
It’s adequately snugged according to lots of satisfied customers
Many users find this K-Swiss athletic shoe to be long-lasting
cons: More than a few consider this stability footgear to be quite heavy
Some of the purchasers wish this tennis shoe was made with more ventilation

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for ankle support.
customer_reviews.text: Have had shoes only a short while but could tell immediately how comfortable yet sturdy this shoe is. Required no break in before tennis match, had no issues with slippage within the shoe or sense of vulnerability of ankles. I bought these shoes to replace the discontinued Prince Viper which was a mid top shoe, I have had issues with ankle rolling and wanted to have best possible protection in a shoe. These shoes have a sturdy supportive area surrounding the ankle area, not like a mid or high top, but a noticeably firm feel. Time will tell if this structure wears under the pressure of match play,but for now, I feel safe from the dreaded ankle roll.
customer_reviews.author: boli

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Replacement for the Defier Line
customer_reviews.text: KSwiss stopped making the Defier line, which was a fabulous shoe. Great fit, great support, great ventilation, etc. I was referred to the Ultrascendor as a replacement for the Defier, but I don't really care for the shoe. Unfortunately, I bought two pair. I don't feel the same support, my feet sweat much more, and the material seems flimsy compared to the Defier. I've got to seek out a different shoe. They look pretty good and are an OK shoe, but definitely not as good as the Defier.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Still my favorite K-Swiss
customer_reviews.text: had Ultrascendor back when they came out and these are my 2nd pair... love 'em ... the fit; the style; the durability ... top notch
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Dias

customer_reviews.title: A good tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: With an arthritic knee nearing 70 years of age, I am fussy about my shoes. The K-Swiss Defier and Ultraschendor have served me well. For tennis, they are my favorite. When my knee starts hurting, I know it is time to get a new pair, which I do 2 or three times per year, even though they still look good. Different folks find different shoes to be a good fit, so perhaps there are those who will not find them to be as comfortable and supportive as I do, but I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Bjork

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss quality seems to be falling
customer_reviews.text: I have played tennis wearing the Ultrascendor for as long as I can remember (I am old so that might not be too long.) I now have to replace or add a thicker insole as the stock insole does not cover the feel of the grid on the shoe. I suspect that after many years of wearing Ultracendors my next pair will be from another manufacturer. It is a shame because I do like the shoe box and tread.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several KSwiss tennis shoes including Big Shot, Glaciator and others. This is the most comfortable of all while providing some ankle support. No need to break-in. Great for winter as ventilation is not the best. Shoe is a bit heavy. Will never try any other shoe except maybe for the summer when more ventilation is needed.
customer_reviews.author: H. Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, very good durability, good value
customer_reviews.text: Have gone back to K Swiss after years of using cheap Nike tennis sneakers. These are much more comfortable. Last pair of K Swiss had excellent durability, although these are quite new for me still. Of course you pay a bit more, but I find this trade off well worth it. You get what you pay for. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MTDNJ

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: i like these shoes. they are comfortable. and they last for a long time. i'll keep buying them
customer_reviews.author: danny lee davis

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoe of choice
customer_reviews.text: So glad that K-Swiss continues to make this shoe ... and very glad that it was being offered at a reasonable price. For me, this is the Pirelli tire of tennis shoes and they have saved my footing more than once! Great materials ... solid footbed .... comfortable on and off the court ... and the traction!! I've worn through a half a dozen pair over the years and that takes some real effort! allen
customer_reviews.author: Allen C. Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!  FedX Shipping was a little Slow.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe. I don't think it could have fit any better the first time I tried them on. They also look nice by keeping the style simple, some other brands just look too clownish to me. I do wish K-Swiss would give the option of using UPS instead of FedX. I don't know if it's my location or what, but I usually get things delivered one day early when using UPS.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cambuel

customer_reviews.title: Not the Ultrascendor You Were Expecting?
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the K-Swiss Ultrascender for many years. With it's high arch, heel support and numerous design features, it is without a doubt the best court shoe I've found. Unfortunately, the current shoe has been dumbed down from its original version. The high arch support is still there, but many other features have been removed probably in an effort to reduce production costs without raising prices. I am disappointed in K-Swiss, and feel the company is misrepresenting this product to those of us that have purchased it in the past. Next time I'll know to look for a different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Destin

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis show..!!!
customer_reviews.text: This must be my fifth pair of these. I play tennis at least a couple of times a week on hardcourts and this shoe lasts a long time while providing great support for lateral movement. It took a year to wear the bottoms off my old pair and yet they still had the kind of support you need for tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Support Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these shoes for the past ten years (NTRP 3.5) because they provide exactly what I need in a tennis shoe, with no break-in period. They are slightly heavier than some other brands/models, but I haven't found that to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: David in Denver

customer_reviews.title: above average shoes !!!
customer_reviews.text: For a person who does not play tennis and use it as an everyday shoe ... this is almost excellent! I am a bit overweight and my foots is actually a little wider than people my size, but there is no need to break this shoe in! I could just slip on it without untying and adjusting! nice for short brisk walks too! On long brisk walk, some other brand shoes are propbably better, but the comfot makes up for it! No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Frias Ostil

customer_reviews.title: Fit like always
customer_reviews.text: Kswiss is the only shoes my boyfriend will wear and he loved this style. He said they have a little more padding then most Kswiss but that is a plus in his eyes. Will definately keep these in mind for the next pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Support - Could Use More Venting
customer_reviews.text: I wear K-Swiss for tennis and bought these for walking around because of the great fit and support. The only negative is it would use more venting. Your feet do get hot in them when walking distances or working out.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Meller

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss Men's Ultrascendor Tennis Shoe,White/Navy/Silver,11 M
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tennis shoe which I will purchase again in the future. Highly recommended for someone who plays competitive tennis and needs a stable, but light tennis shoe. Wish the price was a little lower, however.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hempel

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Tennis Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Wore these shoes for the 1st time Sunday evening playing PickleBall. They are lightweight and fit very well. I took the advice of some reviewers and ordered 1/2 size bigger and I'm glad I did. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Seal8

customer_reviews.title: K swiss tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: K Swiss tennis shoes are an excellent buy, they feel and look good, last forever. I get a lot of comments. they are unique and stand out from the rest. I recommend them if you want to make a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My go to tennis shoe, extremely comfortable- I buy a half size larger and add dr Scholl's sports pad cushions- sore feet stopped immediately ( got this trick from Pete Sampras), have bought this shoe three times, has never let me down
customer_reviews.author: David Webster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for Tennis!
customer_reviews.text: This is my prefered shoe and brand for tennis. My feet are flat, medium in width ("D"), with a low arch. Thhis shoe is already broke in the day they arrived. Fit perfectly. They are stable, reliable, and always cool, comfortable, and satisfying to wear. I highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JElder

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect...
customer_reviews.text: I have had good luck with the top of the line K-Swiss Ultrascendor tennis shoes - good fit and the right combination of comfort and support. They aren't flashy and the design pretty much hasn't changed in years but I always know what I am getting with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kawa

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I've been a K-Swiss user for many years. They're not always easy to find, but I always regret the decision to buy something else. Good support and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Prucino

customer_reviews.title: Have worn this shoe for tennis and love the support and durability
customer_reviews.text: Have worn this shoe for tennis and love the support and durability. I am on my third pair and hope kswiss will continue to make this style.
customer_reviews.author: Consuella

customer_reviews.title: Some break-in required
customer_reviews.text: Many reviews indicate no break in required on these shoes. I would say that for leather shoes, that is not necessarily what you want. I did need some time to break in the shoes (approx. 4 wearing sessions), but I would expect that from new leather, and that a better fit is the result. I like the shoes for my weekly 1.5 hour tennis games. These are my second pair of K-Swiss leather shoes for tennis. I continue wearing my original pair for fitness classes.
customer_reviews.author: Craig T.

customer_reviews.title: First
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Reebok Nike guy, this is my first pair of K-Swiss you won't be disappointed, they fit great easy on your feet, and I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: thammer1

customer_reviews.title: KSwiss is consistently good
customer_reviews.text: If you are are looking for a tennis shoe that you can confidently order through a website - this is the shoe. Never had to worry about size or later delivery. In fact the delivery exceeded my expectations. The quality of the shoe is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted the exact same shoe in the mid version as I like the extra ankle support but could not find it anywhere on the web. This shoe fits perfectly and has the same long wearing soles as the mid so if my ankles get sore I'll just wear an ankle brace with the shoe. K-Swiss has a winner with this and the mid shoe. Hope they never discontinue them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great Sport Shoe for Cross Training
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this model of shoe for past few years and they are wonderful. I have enjoyed the comfort and fit of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Bleah
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice looking. Size a bit large. Material decent. Workmanship seems ok. Seems a bit stiff to begin with..
customer_reviews.author: Rehsawg

customer_reviews.title: I think the quality of materials used isn't as good as before
customer_reviews.text: These are the same brand and style of sneakers I have worn for years but these caused blisters for the first time. I think the quality of materials used isn't as good as before. After I broke them in, they are okay but I probably won't buy them online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: K.F.

customer_reviews.title: My favorites
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for years. I don't shop for tennis shoes anymore so I always buy them on the Internet. A lot cheaper that way.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Longtime User
customer_reviews.text: Have used same shoes for over 10years and happy K Swiss did not change them They are stable sized properly.
customer_reviews.author: Fnm

customer_reviews.title: SUper Super Fast shipping. Perfect product!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these and they arrived THE NEXT DAY. Great company. Product is authentic and packaged perfectly. I can't wear Nike shoes because they are too narrow. Used to buy Wilson's but their quality went way down over the years. This is a classic no BS quality tennis shoe that is comfortable on the court and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: JRuss

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes but Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but kind of stiff. Maybe I'm just getting old?
customer_reviews.author: donald wilson

customer_reviews.title: Better tennis shoes than the other guys.
customer_reviews.text: You really have nothing to lose with these shoes, great fit, nice style and long lasting. I am on my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Tennant

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Look no further for people with ankle issues like me. I play with confidence and comfort with these shoes. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Alain Mussely

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tennis shoe,not sure it is materially better than some competing shoes
customer_reviews.author: Phil Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love K-Swiss shoes. These arrived on time and are exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe for competitive tennis
customer_reviews.text: I began using this shoe several years ago for tennis, after I developed plantar fasciitis. Have not had a problem since! They fit well if I use one half size larger than my street shoes. They wear well and are well padded. Best shoe I have used. John Sarbacker
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: I feel the width is more C width than a DC width. I will not be buying the Ultrascendor tennis shoe again as I feel I need a full D width or more rounded toe. The shoe appears to be of excellent quality except for its width. I need a shoe with a full "D" width. The "C" width is a little tight. Your shoes used to be less tight.
customer_reviews.author: Norman M. Bubash

customer_reviews.title: poor QC
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturing flaw: a poorly glued lining inside the heel created a ridge of fabric. This caused heel blisters. Not repairable. I should have returned them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: GregP

customer_reviews.title: Comfort tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Still for me the best comfort tennis shoe out there. If you or sore after playing try this classic shoe
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable tennis shoe I've owned
customer_reviews.text: The K-Swiss Ultrascendor is the most comfortable pair of tennis shoes I've owned yet. There are no painful spots, the toe box is plenty wide, and the leather is very flexible. The lining around the ankle area is also very comfortable, and the opening is wide enough that they slip on/off easily without untying. I use these for tennis, other sports, and also as everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.author: arkmich

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The heel kept slipping up and down. did not fit properly I sent them back
customer_reviews.author: loretta r duffy

customer_reviews.title: Fit great! COMFY, and room for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Subject line pretty much says it all. Great shoes. Highly recommend them, especially if your feet are wider. Tip: Buy a 1/2 size larger than your feet size, for even more room.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Iden

customer_reviews.title: Why stop making the Mid version?
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, however, I have been using the mid height version for years now and would have preferred to continue using it. I really like the extra ankle support! Why oh why did you stop making it???
customer_reviews.author: Guy B. Logan

customer_reviews.title: exceptional tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: these tennis shoes are extremely soft and comfortable, players who play on hard courts will love them. hard to find in Europe now, I succeeded in finding them in US at a total price which is in line with or even below european market prices for shoes of same level. remarkable fast delivery to my home after purchase
customer_reviews.author: Pier Luigi Di Federico

customer_reviews.title: One small gripe
customer_reviews.text: Runs slightly large, but very comfortable except for the digging into my right ankle from the outer edge - maybe they just need to be broken in better or else I'll have to wear padded socks... Other than that - a classic tennis sneaker that will never go out of style...
customer_reviews.author: Basil Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, my third pair over past few years. Good fit, support, and wear. I will buy again when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these shoes in the past...all of which were purchased from Midwest Sports. The pair I received through my Amazon Prime account were horribly mis sized
customer_reviews.author: A. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: They look good and fit perfect.Love the style of the sneaker.KSwiss are very durable snakers.4th pair and I still love them.
customer_reviews.author: CBGB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. This is my fifth pairs
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. This is my fifth pairs. Light weight and great ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: d1966

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and they are getting increasingly harder to find. These are the best! I ususally order two pair at a time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Felder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Very comfortable. I have over pronation, and this shoe is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: The light weight is what I like the most
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this model for several years. The light weight is what I like the most.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cruz

customer_reviews.title: The only shoe for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I play a lot of tennis and the 7.0 K- Swiss shoe is the only shoe that I have worn that didn't make my arches hurt. I am on my fifth pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Seward

customer_reviews.title: Best Tennis Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like that the shoes come completely laced when I receive them. That didn't used to be the case. My friends like my shoes too. Not many stores carry them though. The shoes wear well and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best tennis shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third set of Ultrascendors because I haven't found a better tennis shoe. These are so well designed and and comfortable right out of the box. These are already a classic IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: everything is fine except for the size
customer_reviews.text: I guess, this is the downside of ordering online. But am not complaining. the shoes is very satble and can support my lateral, and quick moves. It is also light to move. am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ayban

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tennis sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic tennis sneaker. No break-in period required for a sneaker produced by K-Swiss.. The Amazon promotion made it a sweet deal. Shoe fits to size of foot for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My shoe for tennis
customer_reviews.text: I occcasionally try others - always come back (usually because my feet are hurting). Toebox is wide, no break-in required.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Tabone

customer_reviews.title: Good sports shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Will be ordering a second pair. Good fit and functionality. Good choice for me. I'll use them both in gym and on the courts.
customer_reviews.author: Tex

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss Men's Tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were just what my son had wanted and I was pleased i could purchase them for him. I would like to thank Amazon for their assistant with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This the only tennis shoe that fits my feet. Been using them ever since they came out. Keep making these please K-Swiss.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Moffatt

customer_reviews.title: classic look
customer_reviews.text: comfort in running the court was what we expected in this shoe and the brand has proven itself once again
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss Review too
customer_reviews.text: The hard toe cap was unforgiving. Other than that, it was a good shoe. It was difficult to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Lapsley

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss Ultrascendor Fit
customer_reviews.text: Although an "expert" review claims that the shoe width is "generous", I found it to be a bit tight on the front side.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J.

customer_reviews.title: Very good Tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like the good quality and excellent price! I will order again. Thank you! K-Swiss is the best. Can't wait for sunny days to play tennis!
customer_reviews.author: Pavol Hollosy

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I play tennis 5 mornings a week and found that the K/Swiss shoe fits AND performs above my expectations. It is very comfortable and laces up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Butch W.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shoes for about 8-10 years.I love them , and I recommend them to everyone I know. ( Tennis players that is) A.R.
customer_reviews.author: alcides roverano

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the only sneakers I have worn in 10 yrs...this is the 6 th pair I have owned...
customer_reviews.author: James F. Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, always fits, performs as expected.
customer_reviews.text: What else do I need? Hope they continue to offer it. Just wish I could find it for a few bucks less.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Roberts

customer_reviews.title: K-Swiss Ultrascendor Tennis Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this same shoe for tennis for about 15 years. It never disappoints. Thankfully K-Swiss keeps making them!
customer_reviews.author: John A. Turley

customer_reviews.title: K Swiss Ultrascendor. Comfortable. Good support.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was faster than anticipated. Shoes were a perfect fit and required no real break in period. They're comfortable and provide very good support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these shoes. In fact I have six other identical tennis shoes, I have no complaints/
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yudell

customer_reviews.title: tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is really a nice shoe but was half size smaller so i can not wear them.Also I wanted to buy a mid version, but unfortunately ordered the low one.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I have had 5 pair of the same shoe over ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had 5 pair of the same shoe over the last 6 or 7 years and they all are great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfectly and required no break-in time. I needed a wider shoe and this pair fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: hoos63

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The K Swiss is always a good fitting, feeling tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my old k-Swiss tennis shoes were too tight. Unfortunately these require insoles and are still loose.
customer_reviews.author: DEMO

customer_reviews.title: worst shoes EVER, DON'T BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't review products but I had to tor this one. ITS THE WORST SHOES EVER. it ripped after 2 weeks. my knee started hurting like nothing else. PLEASE DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. Its low low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: feedback

product_meta.title: K-Swiss Mens Ultrascendor-M Ultrascendor-m
feature_bullets: Full grain leather and synthetic upper
Skeletalized outsole with exposed EVA midsole
High-abrasion TecTuff toe wrap and DragGuard in the toe and heel
Engineered to elevate the level of game play
Includes a tennis-specific, multi-surface wavebone tread pattern for lasting durability and traction
